quotes.author: Nick Bostrom
quotes.quote: This paper argues that at least one of the following propositions is true.
quotes.source_title: Are You Living in a Computer Simulation?

quotes.author: Nick Bostrom
quotes.quote: Provided a system implements the right sort of computational structures and processes, it can be associated with conscious experiences.
quotes.source_title: Are You Living in a Computer Simulation?

quotes.author: John F. Nash Jr.
quotes.quote: A self-countering n-tuple is called an equilibrium point.

quotes.author: John C. Harsanyi
quotes.quote: Game theory is a theory of strategic interaction.

quotes.author: Thomas C. Schelling
quotes.quote: The threat is a commitment to a strategy for second move.
quotes.source_title: The Strategy of Conflict: Prospectus for a Reorientation of Game Theory

quotes.author: Thomas C. Schelling
quotes.quote: The most spectacular event of the past half century is one that did not occur.
quotes.source_title: An Astonishing Sixty Years: The Legacy of Hiroshima (Nobel Lecture)

quotes.author: Robert J. Aumann
quotes.quote: Wars and other conflicts are among the main sources of human misery.

quotes.author: Reinhard Selten
quotes.quote: In this way the gap between model and reality is not closed, but maybe diminished or at least illuminated.
quotes.source_title: Multistage Game Models and Delay Supergames (Nobel Lecture)
